code: const projects=[{title:"Image Classification App",tech:"TensorFlow, Streamlit",year:"2024",problem:"Automate image recognition for diverse categories.",data:"Custom labeled image dataset.",features:"Image augmentation, normalization.",model:"Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with 85%+ accuracy.",results:"Achieved robust classification; deployed via Streamlit.",lessons:"Gained expertise in data preprocessing and model tuning.",future:"Expand to multi-class and mobile deployment.",demo:"",github:""},{title:"NLP Chatbot with Sentiment Analysis",tech:"Flask, scikit-learn",year:"2024",problem:"Provide conversational AI with emotional intelligence.",data:"Text conversation logs, sentiment datasets.",features:"Sentiment scoring, intent recognition.",model:"NLP pipeline with sentiment classifier.",results:"Deployed REST API for real-time chatbot.",lessons:"Integrated NLP models with backend APIs.",future:"Add multi-lingual support and richer sentiment features.",demo:"",github:""},{title:"Generative AI PDF Chatbot",tech:"LangChain, GPT-4, FAISS",year:"2024",problem:"Enable intelligent Q&A over uploaded documents.",data:"PDF documents, vector embeddings.",features:"Document chunking, semantic search.",model:"LangChain pipeline with GPT-4 and FAISS vectors.",results:"Live bot deployed on Hugging Face Spaces.",lessons:"Learned chaining LLMs with custom retrieval.",future:"Support for more file types and enterprise deployment.",demo:"",github:""},{title:"Resume Ranker API",tech:"Flask, MySQL",year:"2024",problem:"Automate candidate fit prediction for hiring.",data:"Resumes, job descriptions.",features:"Text vectorization, skill extraction.",model:"ML model for resume-job fit scoring.",results:"REST API for ranking candidates, integrated with MySQL.",lessons:"Built scalable ML API and learned database integration.",future:"Integrate with ATS and add advanced analytics.",demo:"",github:""}];export default projects;

sourcesContent:
const projects = [
  {
    title: "Image Classification App",
    tech: "TensorFlow, Streamlit",
    year: "2024",
    problem: "Automate image recognition for diverse categories.",
    data: "Custom labeled image dataset.",
    features: "Image augmentation, normalization.",
    model: "Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) with 85%+ accuracy.",
    results: "Achieved robust classification; deployed via Streamlit.",
    lessons: "Gained expertise in data preprocessing and model tuning.",
    future: "Expand to multi-class and mobile deployment.",
    demo: "",
    github: ""
  },
  {
    title: "NLP Chatbot with Sentiment Analysis",
    tech: "Flask, scikit-learn",
    year: "2024",
    problem: "Provide conversational AI with emotional intelligence.",
    data: "Text conversation logs, sentiment datasets.",
    features: "Sentiment scoring, intent recognition.",
    model: "NLP pipeline with sentiment classifier.",
    results: "Deployed REST API for real-time chatbot.",
    lessons: "Integrated NLP models with backend APIs.",
    future: "Add multi-lingual support and richer sentiment features.",
    demo: "",
    github: ""
  },
  {
    title: "Generative AI PDF Chatbot",
    tech: "LangChain, GPT-4, FAISS",
    year: "2024",
    problem: "Enable intelligent Q&A over uploaded documents.",
    data: "PDF documents, vector embeddings.",
    features: "Document chunking, semantic search.",
    model: "LangChain pipeline with GPT-4 and FAISS vectors.",
    results: "Live bot deployed on Hugging Face Spaces.",
    lessons: "Learned chaining LLMs with custom retrieval.",
    future: "Support for more file types and enterprise deployment.",
    demo: "",
    github: ""
  },
  {
    title: "Resume Ranker API",
    tech: "Flask, MySQL",
    year: "2024",
    problem: "Automate candidate fit prediction for hiring.",
    data: "Resumes, job descriptions.",
    features: "Text vectorization, skill extraction.",
    model: "ML model for resume-job fit scoring.",
    results: "REST API for ranking candidates, integrated with MySQL.",
    lessons: "Built scalable ML API and learned database integration.",
    future: "Integrate with ATS and add advanced analytics.",
    demo: "",
    github: ""
  }
];

export default projects;
